GET PERSONAL PEP TALKS To keep you on track toward better health, Fitbit Alta can send you reminders to move throughout the day. On-screen messages encourage you to reach mini-goals of 250 steps per hour and cheer you on when you do. NEVER MISS A WORKOUT WITH SMARTTRACK Automatically track exercises like walks, runs and elliptical sessions, then open the app to see a summary of your workout and how you’re stacking up toward your weekly exercise goals. FIND A STYLE THAT FITS Create the right accessory for any occasion—from work to workouts and beyond— with accessory bands from our Classic or Luxe collections. Tracker not included.
